Class MetricQuery

public class MetricQuery
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a query for Metrics matching the specified conditions

addCondition

public void addCondition(java.lang.String oid)
Set the OID condition from an OID string.

Parameters:
oid - The OID. If an element in the OID is to be excluded from the condition, specify an asterisk or question mark (e.g. "100.5.*.61"). If an element in the OID can be within any range, use "min-max" (e.g. "100.?.1000-1999")
